name: The Wright Time
description:
For some reason, terrain doesn't work in WebGL.  There is a working Windows build in the Downloads section.

Controls

  • Left click the throttle lever to your left to throttle up, right click to throttle down
  • W/S to pitch, A/D to roll, Q/E to yaw
  • Hold Left Alt to free your cursor
  • Alt-F4 to exit

Credits

  • Code by Anna Savova, Ruaridh Wilson, and Tom
  • Music by Daniel Butler
  • 3D modelling and art by Magnus Fraser
